The XML file in this folder has been downloaded from sblgnt.com.
It contains The Greek New Testament: SBL Edition.
Michael W. Holmes, General Editor
Copyright 2010 Logos Bible Software and the Society of Biblical Literature

sblgnt.xml
This is the master file for the SBL Greek NT.

create_sblgnt_database.php
This script imports the XML file into a SQLite database fit for use in Bibledit.
